title: WhyFhy
author: WhyFhy
content: I'd start a trust fund or self sustaining family company.Aiming for real estate, commercial and residential.(apartment complexes, franchises and houses) Snowballing most profits into more properties/investment portfolios,compounding any high interest thing I can find while only absorbing a nominal % of profits. My family wouldn't know but I'd have them on the trust and everyone eventually would start getting 2-6k a month from said trust, and the trust could continue growth. I wanna hear what some of you guys would do aside from the buy a big house and a lambo. How would you turn 1billion into 2+?

comments.author: devil2man
comments.body: if I had all that money obviously beyond the house, car, travel around the world, i would invest everything in crypto to stake or liquidity to try to increase everything

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: It’s an obscene amount of money, far too much to give an average person in my opinion. You can never spend that amount of money in several generations, if you live even semi normally.If I won that much I’d obviously have a great life, beyond my wildest dreams. I’d have to give something back though. I’d do a lot of charity & give some away.

comments.author: Lak93xy
comments.body: Probably focus on Space Exploring and supporting local businesses. A large part of it supports startups.

comments.author: btc78
comments.body: will use the 750 million dollars to Buy Bitcoin , , and the other 100 million for another Bitcoin , and the next 100 million for another Bitcoin , and the 45 million is for Bitcoin .and the remaining 5 million will be for my family to decide .

comments.author: BitcoinBarrel
comments.body: Wait a few months before claiming, hire an attorney to process the winning ticket anonymously and never tell a soul.I would also pay cash for the ticket and walk to the store so my identity was protected. Opt for the annualized payments for maximum value.After that, I would carry on living life normally while making smart, calculated investments. It's really the only way to live a normal life after winning that much money.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Winning $1 billion lottery would be a absolute dream come true.  There are many important items that I would address. Number one, make sure my retirement fund is funded immediately. There would be not a single day of work for me or my close family and friends.Number two would be to pay off all my debts, buy my mom anything she wants such as a home, and a new boat to sail away to explore the world.
